title: How All 9 Seasons Of American Horror Story Are Connected!
author: GameSpot Universe
comment: Seeing it all laid out like this in order is insane. So much crazy shit happens. This show is truly a bizarre masterpiece and I can't wait for season 10!
I would love AHS do a ghost ship story type season.
I dont care what the concept of the story is, I just want Jessica Lange back.🤣🤣
I need kit Walker and his children to return!!! I NEED ALIENS
There is also one small one u missed in Coven they went to a frat party and that was the same frat place in 1984 when that guy died.
description:
While we wait for Season 10, let's examine the American Horror Story Universe and see how all nine seasons connect based on settings, storylines and characters!

The setting of American Horror Story is a common thread that we’ve observed throughout the series. We've traveled across the United States from Massachusetts to California. 

Subscribe to GameSpot Universe!
